alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Beadle; Davison; Douglas; Jerauld; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 7:06AM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected, with mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of sleet or light freezing rain is possible during the late morning or early afternoon. Please monitor for updates if you have travel plans.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Beadle; Davison; Douglas; Jerauld; Sanborn
